title: [命令方块][2b]用指令方块来制作你的Boss生物(教程共6P)
txt_content:
本帖最后由 贰逼 于 2014-8-6 15:16 编辑 

教程视频：
P1:初始化Boss生物
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUwNjE4Njc2.html

P2:召唤方式与出场动画
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUwNjY3NDI0.html

P3:Boss Buff与技能
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUwNzQzMDY4.html

P4:防御性动作
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUwODEzNzI4.html

P5:Boss生命条
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUwODgyMDg0.html

P6:死亡特效与战利品

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzUxMTM2NTY4.html
Bilibili(无广告)
视频地址


相关链接：
WIKI 区块格式
WIKI Player.dat格式
自定义装备属性
自定义装备生物
自定义怪物属性
自定义药水生物
自定义物品名称
自定义投掷药水
度


原指令：
P1:

最终NBT蜘蛛：
/summon Spider ~ ~1 ~复制代码最终NBT骷髅：
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"KingLeoric",SkeletonType:1,Equipment:[{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:10)],display:{Name:"Skeleton's Punishment"}}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:2,lvl:10},{id:4,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:1)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_leggings",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:5,lvl:10},{id:0,lvl:2},(id:7,lvl:2)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_chestplate",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:7,lvl:1},{id:0,lvl:3},(id:34,lvl:10)]}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:4,lvl:1},{id:5,lvl:10},(id:34,lvl:1)]}}],复制代码最终NBT蜘蛛骑士：
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"KingLeoric",SkeletonType:1,Equipment:[{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:10)],display:{Name:"Skeleton's Punishment"}}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:2,lvl:10},{id:4,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:1)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_leggings",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:5,lvl:10},{id:0,lvl:2},(id:7,lvl:2)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_chestplate",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:7,lvl:1},{id:0,lvl:3},(id:34,lvl:10)]}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:4,lvl:1},{id:5,lvl:10},(id:34,lvl:1)]}}],DropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:500},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:150},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:2,ShowParticles:0b}],复制代码
P2:

创建计分板：
/scoreboard objectives add summon dummy复制代码
为物品设置计分板
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond"}}复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 2 {Item:{id:"minecraft:nether_star"}}复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 3 {Item:{id:"minecraft:bone"}}复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 4 {Item:{id:"minecraft:spider_eye"}}复制代码召唤生物：
/execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=2,score_summon=2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=3,score_summon=3,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=4,score_summon=4,r=1] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=1,score_summon=4,r=1]复制代码/execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=2,score_summon=2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=3,score_summon=3,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=4,score_summon=4,r=1] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"KingLeoric",SkeletonType:1,Equipment:[{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:10)],display:{Name:"Skeleton's Punishment"}}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:2,lvl:10},{id:4,lvl:2},(id:34,lvl:1)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_leggings",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:5,lvl:10},{id:0,lvl:2},(id:7,lvl:2)]}},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_chestplate",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:3,lvl:2},{id:7,lvl:1},{id:0,lvl:3},(id:34,lvl:10)]}},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:4,lvl:1},{id:5,lvl:10},(id:34,lvl:1)]}}],DropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:500},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:150},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:2,ShowParticles:0b}],Riding:{id:Spider,CustomName:"BeakSpider",Attributes:[{Name:generic.followRange,Base:100},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:200},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1.0},{Name:generic.generic.attackDamage,Base:5}]}}复制代码/execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=2,score_summon=2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=3,score_summon=3,r=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=4,score_summon=4,r=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock -1072 56 825 redstone_block复制代码召唤特效：
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ air复制代码/title @a times 10 20 10复制代码/title @a title {text:"WARNING!!!",color:red,bold:true}复制代码/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~复制代码/execute @a ~ ~ ~ /particle depthsuspend ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1 0.000001 4500复制代码

P3:

创建Boss判定：
/scoreboard objectives add isboss dummy复制代码Boss判定：
/scoreboard players set @e[name=BeakSpider] isboss 1复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[name=KingLeoric] isboss 2复制代码Boss Buff:
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1] ~ ~ ~ /particle magicCrit ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.1 0.2 0.1 100复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2] ~ ~ ~ /particle witchMagic ~ ~ ~ 0.2 0.1 0.2 0.1 100复制代码创建技能冷却计时：
/scoreboard objectives add time dummy复制代码技能1：虫群：
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=1000,score_time_min=1000] ~ ~ ~ summon Endermite ~ ~ ~ {Lifetime:1500}复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=3500,score_time_min=3500] ~ ~ ~ summon Endermite ~ ~ ~ {Lifetime:1500}复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=6000,score_time_min=6000] ~ ~ ~ summon Endermite ~ ~ ~ {Lifetime:1500}复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=8500,score_time_min=8500] ~ ~ ~ summon Endermite ~ ~ ~ {Lifetime:1500}复制代码技能2：火球：
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1,score_time=3000,score_time_min=3000] ~ ~ ~ summon Blaze复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1,score_time=8000,score_time_min=8000] ~ ~ ~ summon Blaze复制代码技能3：洞穴蜘蛛：
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=6003,score_time_min=6000] ~ ~ ~ summon CaveSpider复制代码技能4：沉降
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2,score_time=7500,score_time_min=7500] ~ ~ ~ tp @p ~ ~-2 ~ 复制代码技能5：凋零
/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1,score_time=4000,score_time_min=4000] ~ ~ ~ summon ThrownPotion ~ ~1 ~ {Potion:{id:373,Damage:16456,Count:1,tag:{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:20,Amplifier:1,Duration:5,Ambient:1}]}},Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.0],CustomName:"wither"}复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1,score_time=9000,score_time_min=9000] ~ ~ ~ summon ThrownPotion ~ ~1 ~ {Potion:{id:373,Damage:16456,Count:1,tag:{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:20,Amplifier:1,Duration:5,Ambient:1}]}},Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.0],CustomName:"wither"}复制代码/execute @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[name=wither] @p复制代码重置冷却时间：
/scoreboard players set @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=2,score_time=0] time 10000复制代码
倒计时：
/scoreboard players remove @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=2,score_time_min=1] time 1复制代码
设置技能时间：
/scoreboard players set @e[name=KingLeoric] time 10000复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[name=BeakSpider] time 10000复制代码
P4:

瞬移部分：
创建伤害判定：
/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt damage复制代码随机传送（瞬移）：
/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[name=tp] ~ ~ ~ /spreadplayers ~ ~ 5 6 false @e[name=tp]复制代码重置：
/scoreboard players set @p damage 0复制代码物品（破防）处理：
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond"}}复制代码/execute @e[name=tp] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1,r=0] ~ ~ ~ setblock -1106 56 831 air复制代码/execute @e[name=tp] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1,r=0] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1,r=0]复制代码
护盾部分：
创建破防时间计时：
/scoreboard objectives add effect dummy复制代码正面状态效果（护盾）：
/effect @e[score_effect_min=1,score_effect=1000] 11 1 5 true复制代码/effect @e[score_effect_min=1,score_effect=1000] 10 1 2 true复制代码清除正面状态效果+负面状态效果（破防）：
/effect @e[score_effect_min=1000] clear复制代码/effect @e[score_effect_min=1000] 18 99999 1 true复制代码重置计时器：
/execute @e[score_effect_min=1000] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard objectives remove effect复制代码Boss在火焰上倒计时：
/execute @e[score_effect_min=1,score_effect=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @e[score_effect_min=1,score_effect=1000] effect 1复制代码
设置计时器：
/scoreboard players set @e[name=BeakSpider] effect 1复制代码/scoreboard objectives add effect dummy复制代码/scoreboard players set @e[name=KingLeoric] effect 1复制代码
P5:

伤害处理：
创建伤害判定：
/scoreboard objectives add 1 stat.damageDealt 1复制代码创建定值：
/scoreboard objectives add 2 dummy复制代码伤害/定值储存到伤害（得到准确伤害）：
/scoreboard players operation @a 1 /= @a 2复制代码设置定值为10：
/scoreboard players set @a 2 10复制代码准确伤害+储存量储存到储存量：
/scoreboard players operation @a 3 += @a 1复制代码

血条处理：
1-2伤害
/testfor @a[score_3_min=1,score_3=2]复制代码/scoreboard players set @a 1 0复制代码/summon PrimedTnt 238 75.6 -1656 {Fuse:0}复制代码/scoreboard players remove @a[score_3_min=1] 3 1复制代码3-9伤害：
/testfor @a[score_3_min=3,score_3=9]复制代码/scoreboard players set @a 1 0复制代码/summon PrimedTnt 238 72.3 -1656 {Fuse:0}复制代码/scoreboard players remove @a[score_3_min=1] 3 3复制代码10-20伤害：
/testfor @a[score_3_min=10,score_3=20]复制代码/scoreboard players set @a 1 0复制代码/summon PrimedTnt 238 70.3 -1656 {Fuse:0}复制代码/scoreboard players remove @a[score_3_min=1] 3 10复制代码

Boss处理：
探测Boss：
/testfor @e[name=boss]复制代码生成血条：
/summon EnderDragon 238 68 -1656复制代码删除血条：
/tp @e[type=MinecartRideable,name=bm] ~ -100 ~复制代码/tp @e[name=Boss] ~ -100 ~复制代码
P6：
探测Boss
/testfor @e[type=Skeleton,score_isboss_min=2,score_isboss=2]复制代码/testfor @e[score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=2]复制代码/testfor @e[type=Spider,score_isboss_min=1,score_isboss=1]复制代码战利品：
/give @a minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:15.0,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:10.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:0.1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],ench:[{id:0,lvl:5},{id:1,lvl:3},{id:3,lvl:3},{id:4,lvl:3},{id:7,lvl:5},{id:2,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],display:{Name:"Spiderleg",Lore:["The power of the eight legs"]}}复制代码/give @r minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:7},{id:20,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:2},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:27.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:10.0,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance}],display:{Name:"Skeleton's Punishment",Lore:["Skeleton's Punishment","It has strong power..."]}}复制代码死亡特效：
/title @a title {text:"YOU KILL THEM!",color:gold,bold:true}复制代码/weather rain复制代码/execute @a ~ ~5 ~ summon ThrownPotion ~ ~1 ~ {Potion:{id:373,Damage:16456,Count:1,tag:{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:20,Amplifier:3,Duration:5,Ambient:1}]}},Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.0]}复制代码/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~复制代码/xp 45l @a复制代码
阻断/开启：
/setblock -1122 56 831 air复制代码/setblock -1122 56 831 redstone_wire复制代码

/kill @e[type=!Player]复制代码指令方块高频：
/setblock ~1 ~ ~ air复制代码/setblock ~-1 ~ ~ redstone_block复制代码[具体教程在视频中]

Custom Boss
Boss Bar

replies.author: jianghr
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 jianghr 于 2014-8-6 05:42 编辑 

6P已阅，很棒的作品，光6P视频的压制和上传有多蛋疼我可以想象。
有这个基本上可以满足一些小服的需求。不过我一直很在意CB高频对运行平台的压力，视频中也有好几处卡顿的地方。这个高频应该是每游戏刻输出一次对吧？
建议单个模块内无线红石还是使用相对坐标，这样便于整体MCE或WE。
然后血条测试那一段确实辛苦。
我最关心的实际上是CB同时激活的执行顺序，你在视频中提到从三轴小的优先，又提到了信号强的优先，那么这两条哪个为主，且三轴有无优先关系。想问一下，这可以在我某个设计结构中大幅降低延迟。
整体评价是，看起来一步步设计不算难理解，但是楼主是第一个把它们整和到一块去做出需要的效果的人。人说红石计算器也是基本逻辑门的集合呢。
PS:看来新快照1.8按钮的外形有点变化，多了个座子我觉得蛮不错的。

replies.author: 朱大常
replies.txt_content: 粒子效果怎么弄？

replies.author: 捌柒
replies.txt_content:
jianghr 发表于 2014-8-6 05:38
6P已阅，很棒的作品，光6P视频的压制和上传有多蛋疼我可以想象。
有这个基本上可以满足一些小服的需求。不 ...
1、红石激活的顺序有很多因素不好控制，但是弱充能比强充能快，不同方向也不一样快，所以记这些还不如把它控制在相同因素下就可以按顺序执行、
2、那个按钮是贰逼下载的更改过模型的材质包

jianghr 发表于 2014-8-6 05:38
6P已阅，很棒的作品，光6P视频的压制和上传有多蛋疼我可以想象。
有这个基本上可以满足一些小服的需求。不 ...
卡了是因为我之前用的压制工具略坑，后来换了。
因为第一次用的edius合并，格式工厂无法转码，然后换了个比较偏的压制工具，导致画质变差，视频卡顿，后来重录了一遍还是这问题..
指令高频在服务器内算是资源消耗比较少的。最小消耗高频是红石块的clone高频，这边用红石线算是偷懒..
这个高频确实是游戏刻输出。
